name: Entangled!
description:
Entangled! is a Tic-Tac-Toe-inspired for four human or computer players. Players sit in a circle and play simultaneously in the same spot on two boards, each shared with one of their neighbors. Connecting three in a row awards points, and making multiple matches at the same time awards extra points.

Play with humans (local, shared screen and mouse) or against the computer.
